title: Oh My God
author: Adele
lyrics:
[00:11.02] I ain't got too much time to spend
[00:15.82] But I'll make time for you to show how much I care
[00:21.84] Wish that I would let you break my walls
[00:26.68] But I'm still spinning out of control from the fall
[00:32.74] Boy, you give good love, I won't lie
[00:37.58] It's what keeps me coming back even though I'm terrified
[00:44.24] I know that it's wrong
[00:47.04] But I want to have fun
[00:49.89] Mm, yeah, mm, yeah
[00:54.99] I know that it's wrong
[00:57.85] But I want to have fun
[01:00.64] Mm, yeah, mm, yeah
[01:05.21] Oh my god, I can't believe it
[01:07.54] Out of all the people in the world
[01:10.96] What is the likelihood of jumping
[01:13.96] Out of my life and into your arms?
[01:16.25] Maybe, baby, I'm just losing my mind
[01:19.21] 'Cause this is trouble, but it feels right
[01:21.76] Teetering on the edge of Heaven and Hell
[01:25.10] Is a battle I cannot fight
[01:30.19] I'm a fool, but they all think I'm blind
[01:34.96] I'd rather be a fool than leave myself behind
[01:41.08] I don't have to explain myself to you
[01:45.77] I'm a grown woman and I do what I want to do
[01:52.12] I know that it's wrong
[01:55.02] But I want to have fun
[01:58.17] Mm, yeah, mm, yeah
[02:02.96] I know that it's wrong
[02:05.94] But I want to have fun
[02:09.06] Mm, yeah, mm, yeah
[02:13.61] Oh my god, I can't believe it
[02:15.86] Out of all the people in the world
[02:19.18] What is the likelihood of jumping
[02:22.36] Out of my life and into your arms?
[02:24.46] Maybe, baby, I'm just losing my mind
[02:27.43] 'Cause this is trouble, but it feels right
[02:29.85] Teetering on the edge of Heaven and Hell
[02:33.00] Is a battle I cannot fight
[02:35.38] "Lord, don't let me," I said, "Lord, don't let me"
[02:38.04] I said, "Lord, don't let me, let me down" (oh, Lord)
[02:41.09] "Lord, don't let me," I said, "Lord, don't let me
[02:43.43] I said, "Lord, don't let me, let me down" (don't let me let myself down)
[02:46.38] "Lord, don't let me," I said, "Lord, don't let me"
[02:48.71] I said, "Lord, don't let me, let me down" (oh my god)
[02:51.86] "Lord, don't let me," I said, "Lord, don't let me" (oh)
[02:54.35] I said, "Lord, don't let me, let me down"
[02:57.36] Oh my god, I can't believe it
[02:59.32] Out of all the people in the world
[03:02.55] What is the likelihood of jumping
[03:05.83] Out of my life and into your arms?
[03:08.02] Maybe, baby, I'm just losing my mind
[03:11.04] 'Cause this is trouble, but it feels right
[03:13.60] Teetering on the edge of Heaven and Hell
[03:16.50] When it's a battle that I cannot fight
[03:18.91] "Lord, don't let me," I said, "Lord, don't let me" (I know that it's wrong)
[03:21.52] I said, "Lord, don't let me, let me down" (but I want to have fun)
[03:24.43] "Lord, don't let me," I said, "Lord, don't let me" (mm, yeah)
[03:27.09] I said, "Lord, don't let me, let me down" (mm, yeah)

[03:32.57] I said, "Lord, don't let me, let me down" (but I want to have fun)
[03:35.65] "Lord, don't let me," I said, "Lord, don't let me" (mm, yeah)
